item.title: About
item.description: Make sure to use the ask feature Feel free to fire away with any questions in the “Ask” text box. Thanks to the magic of AI, you’ll not only get answers but also some references to dive deeper. Before shooting me any more questions via email, do take a peek at those references. Where am I Now, let me paint a little picture of myself. I call the USA home, juggling life with a handful of kiddos.
